item.title: Path Planning & Trajectory Generation in C++
item.description: This is a writeup of the Self-Driving Car Engineer Nanodegree Term 3 Path Planning project. It was very challenging to say the least, but with the approach presented in the walkthrough, I quickly made headway. It also outlined important implementation details such as working relative to the end of the path instead of the car, and reusing path points from previous iterations of the simulator. Check out my source code.
